mapper.insert: insert into reply (replyNum, ParentNum, UsersID, Contents, PostDate, BoardNum) values ((select ifnull(replyNum,0)+1 from reply), #{ParentNum}, #{UsersID}, #{Contents}, #{PostDate}, #{BoardNum})

insert into reply (replyNum, ParentNum, Count, UsersID, Contents, PostDate, BoardNum) values ((select ifnull(replyNum,0)+1 from reply), #{ParentNum}, #{Count}, #{UsersID}, #{Contents}, #{PostDate}, #{BoardNum})
mapper.update: update reply set ChildCount = #{ChildCount} where ParentNum = #{ParentNum}
update reply set Contents = #{Contents} where replyNum = #{replyNum}
